20110109170007.000|20110109175944.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110109170007.000|20110109170009.000|TR0|CANDY CROWLEY, HOST:  I'm Candy Crowley 
20110109170009.000|20110109170012.000|TR0|and this is a special State of the Union.  
20110109170012.000|20110109170014.000|TR0|Today Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords is 
20110109170014.000|20110109170017.000|TR0|fighting for her life.  The Arizona 
20110109170017.000|20110109170019.000|TR0|Democrat was apparently the target of a 
20110109170019.000|20110109170022.000|TR0|gunman who shot 18 people, six fatally at 
20110109170022.000|20110109170024.000|TR0|a public forum Giffords was holding 
20110109170024.000|20110109170027.000|TR0|yesterday at a Tucson grocery store.  
20110109170027.000|20110109170029.000|TR0|Giffords was shot in the head and is 
20110109170029.000|20110109170032.000|TR0|listed in critical condition but doctors 
20110109170032.000|20110109170034.000|TR0|are optimistic about her chances of 
20110109170034.000|20110109170037.000|TR0|survival.  Four others are listed as 
20110109170037.000|20110109170039.000|TR0|critical, five are in serious condition.
20110109170039.000|20110109170042.000|TR0|
20110109170042.000|20110109170044.000|TR0|Among the six deaths: a federal judge, a 
20110109170044.000|20110109170047.000|TR0|nine-year-old girl and a Giffords staffer. 
20110109170047.000|20110109170049.000|TR0| One suspect was arrested, the motive for 
20110109170049.000|20110109170052.000|TR0|the attack still unclear.
20110109170052.000|20110109170054.000|TR0|
20110109170054.000|20110109170057.000|TR0|Congresswoman Giffords was reelected last 
20110109170057.000|20110109170100.000|TR0|November and was beginning her fifth year 
20110109170100.000|20110109170102.000|TR0|in the U.S. Congress.  A member of the 
20110109170102.000|20110109170105.000|TR0|Blue Dog Coalition, she's known at a 
20110109170105.000|20110109170107.000|TR0|centrist.  Last year Giffords served on 
20110109170107.000|20110109170110.000|TR0|the House foreign affairs, armed services, 
20110109170110.000|20110109170112.000|TR0|and science and technology committees.  
20110109170112.000|20110109170115.000|TR0|Her husband, Captain Mark Kelley is a 
20110109170115.000|20110109170117.000|TR0|veteran of Operation: Desert Storm and a 
20110109170117.000|20110109170120.000|TR0|NASA astronaut.  He's scheduled to command 
20110109170120.000|20110109170122.000|TR0|the Space Shuttle Endeavour in April.
20110109170122.000|20110109170125.000|TR0|
20110109170125.000|20110109170127.000|TR0|Thursday Congresswoman Giffords was on the 
20110109170127.000|20110109170130.000|TR0|House floor taking part in the read of the 
20110109170130.000|20110109170132.000|TR0|Constitution.
20110109170132.000|20110109170135.000|TR0|
20110109170135.000|20110109170137.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)
20110109170137.000|20110109170140.000|TR0|
20110109170140.000|20110109170142.000|TR0|REP. GABRIELLE GIFFORDS, D-ARIZ.:  The 
20110109170142.000|20110109170145.000|TR0|First Amendment, Congress shall make no

20110109170751.000|20110109170754.000|TR0|CROWLEY:  Again, our Dr. Sanjay Gupta is 
20110109170754.000|20110109170756.000|TR0|with us now.  Sanjay, I think probably 
20110109170756.000|20110109170759.000|TR0|what surprised us about that first news

20110109170801.000|20110109170804.000|TR0|said we're cautiously optimistic is that

20110109170814.000|20110109170816.000|TR0|we hear point blank range, 9 millimeter 
20110109170816.000|20110109170819.000|TR0|shot to the head it just seems impossible

20110109170821.000|20110109170824.000|TR0|that, a, one can survive and b, one can 
20110109170824.000|20110109170826.000|TR0|survive intact.  Is this possible?
20110109170826.000|20110109170829.000|TR0|
20110109170829.000|20110109170831.000|TR0|GUPTA:  It is possible.  I've seen that 
20110109170831.000|20110109170834.000|TR0|myself, Candy.  There's lot of civilian 
20110109170834.000|20110109170836.000|TR0|type of gunshot wounds to the head.  There 
20110109170836.000|20110109170839.000|TR0|are so many different factors that can 
20110109170839.000|20110109170841.000|TR0|really determine exactly how someone's 
20110109170841.000|20110109170844.000|TR0|going to do exactly, where the bullet hit.
20110109170844.000|20110109170847.000|TR0|
20110109170847.000|20110109170849.000|TR0|We know a couple of things very important 
20110109170849.000|20110109170852.000|TR0|here.  First of all she got to the 
20110109170852.000|20110109170854.000|TR0|hospital very quickly.  That's an 
20110109170854.000|20110109170857.000|TR0|important factor.  It was described as a 
20110109170857.000|20110109170859.000|TR0|through and through injury, or in and out 
20110109170859.000|20110109170902.000|TR0|injury, Candy.  The significance of that, 
20110109170902.000|20110109170904.000|TR0|if the bullet goes in and then goes out, 
20110109170904.000|20110109170907.000|TR0|the energy of that bullet is still being 
20110109170907.000|20110109170909.000|TR0|dispersed into the air as opposed to being 
20110109170909.000|20110109170912.000|TR0|dispersed into the brain.  If it goes into 
20110109170912.000|20110109170914.000|TR0|the brain, stays there, all that energy, 
20110109170914.000|20110109170917.000|TR0|all that momentum, the velocity just in 
20110109170917.000|20110109170919.000|TR0|the brain and it can cause significant 
20110109170919.000|20110109170922.000|TR0|swelling and injury to the brain.  So 
20110109170922.000|20110109170924.000|TR0|those things help.
20110109170924.000|20110109170927.000|TR0|
20110109170927.000|20110109170929.000|TR0|Also she was talking when she got to the 
20110109170929.000|20110109170932.000|TR0|hospital.  These are details that we're 
20110109170932.000|20110109170934.000|TR0|hearing, Candy.  She was actually able to 
20110109170934.000|20110109170937.000|TR0|communicate when she got to the hospital, 
20110109170937.000|20110109170940.000|TR0|very good sign there and then certainly 
20110109170940.000|20110109170942.000|TR0|what Dr. Rhee said immediately after the 
20110109170942.000|20110109170945.000|TR0|operation that she was able to follow 
20110109170945.000|20110109170947.000|TR0|commands, very important as well.
20110109170947.000|20110109170950.000|TR0|
20110109170950.000|20110109170952.000|TR0|So it is possible.  It varies from patient 
20110109170952.000|20110109170955.000|TR0|to patient, injury to injury, but it 
20110109170955.000|20110109170957.000|TR0|happens, especially in a civilian setting 
20110109170957.000|20110109171000.000|TR0|as opposed to a war zone setting.
20110109171000.000|20110109171002.000|TR0|
20110109171002.000|20110109171005.000|TR0|CROWLEY:  And tell me the second doctor 
20110109171005.000|20110109171007.000|TR0|also talked about the long road ahead.  
20110109171007.000|20110109171010.000|TR0|What do you watch for -- this is a 
20110109171010.000|20110109171012.000|TR0|critical time, it would seem to me, when a 
20110109171012.000|20110109171015.000|TR0|lot can go wrong and then maybe later you 
20110109171015.000|20110109171017.000|TR0|think okay, there's survivability and 
20110109171017.000|20110109171020.000|TR0|what's ahead so what is ahead.
20110109171020.000|20110109171022.000|TR0|
20110109171022.000|20110109171025.000|TR0|GUPTA:  It's a very good point, Candy.  
20110109171025.000|20110109171027.000|TR0|Right now, you're sort of talking about 
20110109171027.000|20110109171030.000|TR0|the binary, is a patient going to be able 
20110109171030.000|20110109171033.000|TR0|to survive or not but in the longer run, 
20110109171033.000|20110109171035.000|TR0|it is more about sort of function.  I just 
20110109171035.000|20110109171038.000|TR0|want to show you quickly if I can, Candy, 
20110109171038.000|20110109171040.000|TR0|on our brain model here.
20110109171040.000|20110109171043.000|TR0|
20110109171043.000|20110109171045.000|TR0|First of all talking about that through 
20110109171045.000|20110109171048.000|TR0|and through injury the idea it might enter 
20110109171048.000|20110109171050.000|TR0|somewhere and exit because the brain is, 
20110109171050.000|20110109171053.000|TR0|you know, you have a convexity to the 
20110109171053.000|20110109171055.000|TR0|brain here so that can happen, and there 
20110109171055.000|20110109171058.000|TR0|could be some bleeding in that area but 
20110109171058.000|20110109171100.000|TR0|that can be obviously taken care of during 
20110109171100.000|20110109171103.000|TR0|surgery.
20110109171103.000|20110109171105.000|TR0|
20110109171105.000|20110109171108.000|TR0|The concern is that area that was damaged, 
20110109171108.000|20110109171110.000|TR0|the brain is like a fluid medium almost 
20110109171110.000|20110109171113.000|TR0|and it can start to have swelling as a 
20110109171113.000|20110109171115.000|TR0|result of just being hit like that, the 
20110109171115.000|20110109171118.000|TR0|injury itself, and that swelling it's so 
20110109171118.000|20110109171121.000|TR0|important to monitor over the next few 
20110109171121.000|20110109171123.000|TR0|days really, and that involves simple 
20110109171123.000|20110109171126.000|TR0|things like having the patient wake up, 
20110109171126.000|20110109171128.000|TR0|wake them up and say, have them follow 
20110109171128.000|20110109171131.000|TR0|commands, hold up two fingers on one hand, 
20110109171131.000|20110109171133.000|TR0|the other hand, wiggle toes, things like 
20110109171133.000|20110109171136.000|TR0|that that gives an indication of what the 
20110109171136.000|20110109171138.000|TR0|higher brain function is but it's also 
20110109171138.000|20110109171141.000|TR0|monitoring blood pressure, checking for 
20110109171141.000|20110109171143.000|TR0|bleeding and things like that.
20110109171143.000|20110109171146.000|TR0|
20110109171146.000|20110109171148.000|TR0|So it's done in intensive care unit.  She 
20110109171148.000|20110109171151.000|TR0|may still be with a breathing tube even 
20110109171151.000|20110109171153.000|TR0|but these things as she progresses and 
20110109171153.000|20110109171156.000|TR0|improves hopefully you start to taper back.

20110109172154.000|20110109172157.000|TR0|streets today in this country.  We have 
20110109172157.000|20110109172159.000|TR0|all these competing interests.  We try to 
20110109172159.000|20110109172202.000|TR0|protect the rights and the privacy of 
20110109172202.000|20110109172204.000|TR0|individuals, and at the same time try to 
20110109172204.000|20110109172207.000|TR0|protect these institutions.        
20110109172207.000|20110109172209.000|TR0|President Reagan is a great example.  You 
20110109172209.000|20110109172212.000|TR0|had a man who was fascinated, that's a 
20110109172212.000|20110109172214.000|TR0|mild word, with Jodie Foster.  There are 
20110109172214.000|20110109172217.000|TR0|many people out there like him.  We don't 
20110109172217.000|20110109172219.000|TR0|know what makes this fellow Loughner tick. 
20110109172219.000|20110109172222.000|TR0| I'm sure the FBI and other security

20110109175609.000|20110109175611.000|TR0|different questions.  On the gun control 
20110109175611.000|20110109175614.000|TR0|issue, we have state and federal laws on 
20110109175614.000|20110109175617.000|TR0|the books that already prohibit person 
20110109175617.000|20110109175619.000|TR0|who's have been deemed mentally insane 
20110109175619.000|20110109175622.000|TR0|from owning and possessing firearms.  I 
20110109175622.000|20110109175624.000|TR0|don't think we'll legislate our way out of 
20110109175624.000|20110109175627.000|TR0|risk associated with people who are insane 
20110109175627.000|20110109175629.000|TR0|or people who are bent on performing evil 
20110109175629.000|20110109175632.000|TR0|acts to kill another person.  And to the 
20110109175632.000|20110109175634.000|TR0|contrary, I think there is abundant 
20110109175634.000|20110109175637.000|TR0|research suggesting that in cities where 
20110109175637.000|20110109175639.000|TR0|more people own guns, the crime rate, 
20110109175639.000|20110109175642.000|TR0|especially the murder rate actually goes 
20110109175642.000|20110109175644.000|TR0|down.
20110109175644.000|20110109175647.000|TR0|
20110109175647.000|20110109175649.000|TR0|So as to the second question, about 
20110109175649.000|20110109175652.000|TR0|whether or not we ought to tone down the 
20110109175652.000|20110109175654.000|TR0|rhetoric, look, like I say, we can always 
20110109175654.000|20110109175657.000|TR0|all benefit by focusing issues back on the 
20110109175657.000|20110109175659.000|TR0|political issues rather than on the 
20110109175659.000|20110109175702.000|TR0|person.  That's good for statesmanship, 
20110109175702.000|20110109175704.000|TR0|good for politics, good for government.  
20110109175704.000|20110109175707.000|TR0|It's not something that's necessarily 
20110109175707.000|20110109175710.000|TR0|going to prevent tragedies like this one 
20110109175710.000|20110109175712.000|TR0|which hopefully will be few and far 
20110109175712.000|20110109175715.000|TR0|between. But it's nonetheless a noble 
20110109175715.000|20110109175717.000|TR0|aspiration, one I aspire to.
20110109175717.000|20110109175720.000|TR0|
20110109175720.000|20110109175722.000|TR0|CROWLEY:  So, when we talked earlier to 
20110109175722.000|20110109175725.000|TR0|some people involved in law enforcement on 
20110109175725.000|20110109175727.000|TR0|Capitol Hill and protecting congress 
20110109175727.000|20110109175730.000|TR0|people who said that there has said there 
20110109175730.000|20110109175732.000|TR0|has been over the past decade increasing - 
20110109175732.000|20110109175735.000|TR0|increasing over the past two years, 
20110109175735.000|20110109175737.000|TR0|increasing numbers of threats against 
20110109175737.000|20110109175740.000|TR0|public officials.  We have seen an 
20110109175740.000|20110109175742.000|TR0|increase in the number of specific 
20110109175742.000|20110109175745.000|TR0|categories of violence sort of nationwide, 
20110109175745.000|20110109175747.000|TR0|although not -- not across the board.  
20110109175747.000|20110109175750.000|TR0|What accounts for that?  If it's not the 
20110109175750.000|20110109175752.000|TR0|political rhetoric, what is making things 
20110109175752.000|20110109175755.000|TR0|seem so much worse now in terms of the 
20110109175755.000|20110109175757.000|TR0|number or threat level?
20110109175757.000|20110109175800.000|TR0|
20110109175800.000|20110109175803.000|TR0|LEE:  I don't know.  And I don't think 
20110109175803.000|20110109175805.000|TR0|anyone pretends to have the answer to 
20110109175805.000|20110109175808.000|TR0|that.  And some have pointed to a 
20110109175808.000|20110109175810.000|TR0|breakdown in the family structure.  Many 
20110109175810.000|20110109175813.000|TR0|people who engage in these activities come 
20110109175813.000|20110109175815.000|TR0|from families that have broken down in one 
20110109175815.000|20110109175818.000|TR0|form or another.  I don't know anything 
20110109175818.000|20110109175820.000|TR0|about the perpetrator of this particular 
20110109175820.000|20110109175823.000|TR0|crime.  So I won't try to speak to that.  
20110109175823.000|20110109175825.000|TR0|But there -- there does appear to have 
20110109175825.000|20110109175828.000|TR0|been an up tick in acts of violence.  And 
20110109175828.000|20110109175830.000|TR0|I think that's unfortunate. It's something 
20110109175830.000|20110109175833.000|TR0|we need to work to address.
20110109175833.000|20110109175835.000|TR0|
20110109175835.000|20110109175838.000|TR0|CROWLEY:  Do you quickly worry about your 
20110109175838.000|20110109175840.000|TR0|own safety?
20110109175840.000|20110109175843.000|TR0|
20110109175843.000|20110109175845.000|TR0|LEE:  No, I don't.  You know, no more than 
20110109175845.000|20110109175848.000|TR0|I did last week.  This obviously draws 
20110109175848.000|20110109175850.000|TR0|attention to it, but it's not going to 
20110109175850.000|20110109175853.000|TR0|cause me to change the way I do business.  
20110109175853.000|20110109175856.000|TR0|I don't think we should be adding any 
20110109175856.000|20110109175858.000|TR0|barrier between a member of congress and 
20110109175858.000|20110109175901.000|TR0|her constituents.  I think we live in a 
20110109175901.000|20110109175903.000|TR0|free society in which it's absolutely 
20110109175903.000|20110109175906.000|TR0|essential that our elected leaders have 
20110109175906.000|20110109175908.000|TR0|constant and open contact with the public. 
20110109175908.000|20110109175911.000|TR0| And tragic events like this one will not 
20110109175911.000|20110109175913.000|TR0|deter us in communicating directly with 
20110109175913.000|20110109175916.000|TR0|our constituents.
20110109175916.000|20110109175918.000|TR0|

20110109175921.000|20110109175923.000|TR0|Senator Mike Lee thank you so much for 
20110109175923.000|20110109175926.000|TR0|joining us.  Appreciate it.
